Josephine LeungDigital designer

I'm a creative, passionate & dedicated digital designer who thrives for success. After starting my career in fashion ecommerce websites, I've gained experience designing across multichannel, from mobile to tablet, from websites to prints. I've got an excellent eye for imagery, typography and layout. I'm capable in producing highly conceptual designs as well as developing on brand, pixel perfect online marketing materials. I have great understanding of user experience within ecommerce and have the ability to adapt quickly to changing priorities.
